v0.1.5, 06.03.2018 -- better and more performant alpha
more testing in production

v0.1.2, 24.02.2018 -- functional alpha I will test in production
- creation/updating of dimension tables fully working
- cumulation of source rows using built-in or custom functions (called post-processing)
- more features than I wanted to do for 0.1.2, need to document all cool features soon
- tests in production start tomorrow

v0.1.1, 11.02.2018 -- Initial release.
